extendedIngredients.name: beef
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 lbs ground turkey or beef, browned and drained

extendedIngredients.name: cooked penne pasta
extendedIngredients.originalString: 8 oz pkg of penne pasta, cooked

recipes.title: Slow Cooker Pepperoni Pizza Penne

winePairing.pairingText: Italian works really well with Chianti, Trebbiano, and Verdicchio. Italians know food and they know wine. Trebbiano and Verdicchio are Italian white wines that pair well with fish and white meat, while Chianti is a great Italian red for heavier, bolder dishes. The Mazzei Chianti Classico Riserva Ser Lapo with a 4.1 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 27 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Mazzei Chianti Classico Riserva Ser Lapo
productMatches.description: Ruby red with violet nuances, this wine has bright aromas of fresh cherries mingle with notes of thyme and subtle smoky nuances. In the mouth, this wine has a bright acid structure providing a lively quality. Cranberry, raspberry and red cherry dominate with hints of leather, cedar and cocoa powder. Some earthiness in the finish and ripe soft tannins.Pasta with meat sauces, stews, grilled meats and mid-aged cheeses.

recipes.instructions: Place half of your ground meat in the bottom of your slow cooker.Layer half of your penne on top.Sprinkle half of your cheese on top of the pasta.Pour half of your can of soup on top.Pour on one jar of pizza sauce.Layer half of your pepperonis across the top.Repeat layering with remaining ingredients.Cover and cook on low for 4 hours.

steps.step: Place half of your ground meat in the bottom of your slow cooker.Layer half of your penne on top.Sprinkle half of your cheese on top of the pasta.
Pour half of your can of soup on top.
Pour on one jar of pizza sauce.Layer half of your pepperonis across the top.Repeat layering with remaining ingredients.Cover and cook on low for 4 hours.
